projects.name: Synapse HR Solution
projects.description: A robust platform revolutionizing human resources management, covering employee attendance, leave management, productivity tracking, recruitment, and skill enhancement.

Collaborated on database schema design and complex business logic
Integrated modules for workforce management, including attendance and leave tracking
responsibilities: Gathered requirements and designed scalable database schemas
Implemented core functionality with Python, Odoo, and Docker
Led agile development sprints and ensured timely feature delivery
achievements: Improved HR efficiency through feature integration
Enhanced stakeholder satisfaction by iterating based on feedback

projects.name: Aikedin
projects.description: A Chrome extension that helps you create Linkedin posts, corrects spelling and grammar mistakes. Additionally it help you generate targeted comments to improve LinkedIn engagement.
highlights: Developed core functionalities, ensuring ease of use
Managed client needs, ensuring alignment with branding
responsibilities: Built the extension for editing LinkedIn posts and managing grammar
Handled backend plugins, authentication, and user access control
achievements: Increased LinkedIn engagement by improving post quality

projects.name: JOIN
projects.description: A recruitment platform for junior enterprises, offering customizable recruitment flows.
highlights: Developed features like interview management and form creation
Maintained the platform during recruitment phases
Enabled customizable recruitment workflows to meet the unique needs of different junior enterprises
Enhanced recruiter management with features to organize and track candidate progress
Optimized platform performance to handle multiple concurrent users during peak recruitment periods
responsibilities: Collaborated on platform conception and created necessary diagrams
Resolved development issues to ensure a smooth user experience
achievements: Deployed platform with positive feedback from junior enterprises

projects.name: DevOps Pipeline Project
projects.description: An academic project for implementing a comprehensive DevOps pipeline that integrates automated testing, CI/CD, Docker, AWS EKS, and Kubernetes.
highlights: Built CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins, integrating stages like Git checkout, Maven build, and unit testing
Configured Docker image creation and pushed to Docker Hub, and deployed using Docker Compose
Implemented AWS EKS cluster deployment with Terraform and automated Helm deployment on Kubernetes
Integrated monitoring with Prometheus and conducted performance tests with JMeter
responsibilities: Collaborated in a team to design and implement each pipeline stage
Configured and executed unit tests using Mockito
Managed Docker image creation and handled automated deployments to AWS EKS cluster
achievements: Enhanced CI/CD pipeline efficiency through automated testing and monitoring
Improved application stability with thorough performance testing and Kubernetes management

responsibilities: Collaborated with clients and third-party providers to address functionality needs
Handled security incident management and optimized deployment processes
Troubleshooted internal functionality issues to maintain site reliability
achievements: Improved operational efficiency through centralized site management
Enhanced security measures, ensuring a smoother and safer user experience
